## Professional Summary
Lauri HÃ¤nninen is a seasoned Product Marketing professional with over 10 years of experience helping startups and technology companies grow through compelling product narratives. Currently leading product marketing at Trezor, the pioneer of hardware cryptocurrency wallets, Lauri specializes in translating complex technical products into clear, customer-centric stories that drive adoption and growth.

## Philosophy
Lauri is a strong advocate for self-custody in cryptocurrency, believing that individuals should have full control over their digital assets. This philosophy aligns with Trezor's mission to empower people with secure, user-friendly hardware wallets.
